column1: The stakes have never been higher. Senator Perdue and Senator Loeffler are in the battlefield fighting for our Republican Senate Majority in Georgia and they need help from across the country. https://t.co/3bRIFssGcw

I didn’t vote for Donald Trump four years ago. I didn’t vote for him in the primary. I didn’t vote for him at the convention. And I didn’t vote for him in the general election.  But this year I am voting for President Trump. Let me explain why... https://t.co/rFrLGXZmEe
I was at the Latinos for Trump rally in Arizona today. This crowd was ready for four more years!   Let’s finish the next few days strong: https://t.co/zS5eaCFcfy https://t.co/hEK6c79kan

Martha McSally is a friend and trusted colleague.  She’s fought for the United States as a fighter pilot and she is still fighting today as a senator.  We need her in the Senate! https://t.co/omIKTkcpsz
This just happened and I’m grateful to be here at the White House to witness it.  Congratulations Justice Barrett! https://t.co/RKL3R4y4qg

“You’re not a policymaker you’re a judge. That’s what we’re here to discuss.” https://t.co/4253m3k8ED

Conservatives want President Donald Trump to name someone in the mold of Justices Samuel Alito and Clarence Thomas and the late Justice Antonin Scalia. Amy Coney Barrett is exactly that kind of nominee. That’s why I hope and expect it will be her. https://t.co/der3gBQIWe

We must remember that the Declaration of Independence is not just a manifesto for natural human rights but it is a manifesto against a strong central government that would infringe upon those rights. a https://t.co/8GlLMlPnd2

Today was a big win for abortion providers and a huge loss for the unborn and the Constitution. There is no right to abortion in the Constitution and the Supreme Court's highly selective use of stare decisis defies logic and reason.

Thomas Massie is one of the most principled members of a Congress. I’m so glad he won his primary this week. Everyone should donate to his campaign to get him across the finish line in November.  https://t.co/CiqgIw0NEw https://t.co/pH6apF6jSR
“Any set of beliefs ... that brings people together needs to be protected.” https://t.co/Phdbk6r6d2
I’m voting for @JonHuntsman of course. https://t.co/pxduwkoxRW
I’m hoping for a speedy recovery for you and your family. You will be in the prayers of the Lee family along with the many others who are suffering from this outbreak. https://t.co/AquUrtEZQs

There is a frightening effort underway to increase surveillance powers of the federal government. There have been abuses of the FISA process in the past and we need to restore safeguards to Americans’ privacy. https://t.co/KvCQCUoJOB

I was so sad to learn of Tom Coburn’s passing.  Senator Coburn was a friend and example to all who knew him and I feel deeply blessed to count myself among those who did.  My thoughts and prayers are with Carolyn and the rest of Tom’s family.

The House FISA deal doesn’t fix what’s wrong with FISA.  It would not have stopped the spying that occurred against @realDonaldTrump.  I will do everything I can to oppose it in the Senate.  If it passes @realDonaldTrump should veto it.

Three provisions of FISA are set to expire on March 15th.  Congress should not reauthorize them without reform.  Our intelligence-gathering agencies need to focus on foreign agents and terrorists and should not be spying on U.S. citizens.  Do you agree? https://t.co/EK1KnzRAbV
